product_name: Continental Ultra Gator Skin Tire - 700 x 28
long_description: The Continental Ultra Gatorskin tire is a real long-distance runner. Use it on the way to work, as well as training for and riding in road races. Durable carbon black compound gives good puncture protection and Duraskin anti-cut sidewall fabric protects the casing from cuts, punctures and abrasion. Modern tread design collects less debris.
short_description: The Continental Ultra Gatorskin tire is a real long-distance runner. Use it on the way to work, as well as training for and riding in road races.
